body:
fixes https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/3179


with this PR
```
$ spack install dealii@develop
==> Installing dealii
==> zlib is already installed in /Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/zlib-1.2.10-oh65pcwikiqep74vtfaitp6ojgzivaag
...
==> gsl is already installed in /Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-sierra-x86_64/clang-8.0.0-apple/gsl-2.3-zpffzwkqlu2zkpp6f4gv6xppiqsxz63m
==> Trying to clone git repository:
  https://github.com/dealii/dealii.git
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged dealii-develop-yfqypqhbak6tfj2t5zlz7t55otkc32pm in /Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/stage/dealii-develop-yfqypqhbak6tfj2t5zlz7t55otkc32pm
==> No patches needed for dealii
==> Building dealii [CMakePackage]
==> Executing phase : 'cmake'
...
```
title: make git fetching quiet
